author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Fire & Feast MBN Sanctioned BBQ CompetitionTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Fire & Feast MBN Sanctioned BBQ Competition Published on : Friday, September 11, 2015
Don’t miss the 5th annual Fire & Feast MBN Sanctioned BBQ Competition in Yazoo City, Mississippi! September 11 – 12, 2015 at the Yazoo County Fairgrounds 203 Hugh McGraw Drive (aka Airport Road) Yazoo City, Mississippi 39194 2 BBQ Competitions: • MBN Professional BBQ Competition (Whole Hog, Ribs, and Shoulder) 1st Place CASH Prize of $2000 in each of the 3 Categories! MBN Grand Champion Cash Prize of $3000! • Backyard BBQ Competition 1st Place CASH Prize of $1000! AND 5 Ancillary Categories: Anything But Pork, Dessert, Sauce, Hot Wings, and Cocktails 1st Place Cash Prize of $100 in each Category! We’re giving away OVER $21,325 in CASH Prizes for 2015 PLUS great trophies by two members of the Mississippi Craftsmen’s Guild and MORE. You have to be in it to win it. Get your applications in and make your plans now to head to Yazoo City!
Source:- Visit Mississippi
